name: Bernadette PEOPLES-the Benefactor (a Living Woman), Petitioner v. BANK OF AMERICA, N.A. Trustee, et al; Justin Kirk, Esquire, Lipsky and Brandt Law Firm, et al., Respondents
name_abbreviation: Peoples v. Bank of America, N.A.

judges: Justice MUNDY did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
parties: Bernadette PEOPLES—the Benefactor (a Living Woman), Petitioner v. BANK OF AMERICA, N.A. Trustee, et al; Justin Kirk, Esquire, Lipsky and Brandt Law Firm, et al., Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 22nd day of July, 2016, the Application for Extraordinary and King’s Bench Jurisdiction is DENIED.
Justice MUNDY did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
143 A.3d 382
Bernadette PEOPLES—the Benefactor (a Living Woman), Petitioner v. BANK OF AMERICA, N.A. Trustee, et al; Justin Kirk, Esquire, Lipsky and Brandt Law Firm, et al., Respondents.
No. 82 EM 2016.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 22, 2016.
